frontmatter.title: One Step to Bucket List Journey

nodes.name: Cipher
nodes.description: Cipher SIG brings together people interested in Computer Science and Information Technology.

nodes.name: Rovisp
nodes.description: Rovisp SIG brings together people who are passionate about Electronics and Electrical Technology.

nodes.name: Torsion
nodes.description: Torsion SIG brings together people interested in Mechanical, Civil, Chemical and Material Sciences.

nodes.name: Inkheart
nodes.description: Inkheart is our new Lit&Phil SIG for people who are passionate about literature, music etc

nodes.name: Medium
nodes.description: Medium SIG is dedicated to people interested in Media and Marketing.

nodes.title: OCR API
nodes.description: An API powered by a neural network model trained to recognize handwritten text from images

nodes.title: Currency Analyzer
nodes.description: To build a model to identify and classify Indian Currency bills into 10 Rs note, 20 Rs note, 50 Rs note and so on. The model will be built using convolutional neural networks and image processing techniques.

nodes.title: Chatbot
nodes.description: To build a bot which would reply to our questions and make simple conversations.

nodes.title: Human Activity Recognition
nodes.description: This project is to build a model that predicts the human activities such as Walking, Walking_Upstairs, Walking_Downstairs, Sitting, Standing or Laying using the data recorded through accelerometer and gyroscope sensors.

nodes.title: Pose Correction - AI Trainer
nodes.description: An intelligent system for workout posture evaluation with Ensemble Deep Neural Models. It assists the user by providing feedback regarding if the workout posture for a given workout is correct or not.

nodes.title: The VR Project
nodes.description: A method to convert the given 2D sketch of the structure into a full fledged 3D structure which is ready to be experienced in VR.

nodes.title: Eastern western note classifier
nodes.description: We were able to analyze a simple series of musical sounds and determine each of their respective note simultaneously..

nodes.title: Net Zero Energy Building
nodes.description: The Net Zero Energy Buildings (NZEB) platform is a one-stop shop to learn about NZEB fundamentals, build alliances with professionals and organizations, find inspiration from case studies, explore the latest technology/policies/ideas and everything NZEB. India emerges as a global leader for energy efficiency and renewable energy integration in buildings, with a thriving market and conducive policy environment for NZEBs.
